TEXT.TITLE: <TIE/TELECOMMUNICATIONS CANADA LTD> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr one ct vs six cts Oper net 48,000 vs 556,000 Revs 19.0 mln vs 26.5 mln Year Oper shr 19 cts vs 46 cts Oper net 1,586,000 vs 3,971,000 Revs 90.8 mln vs 103.1 mln NOTE: Previous oper net excludes 404,000 dlrs of extraordinary expenses for qtr and 991,000 dlr gain for year. TIE/communications Inc <TIE> holds 65 pct interest. Reuter
